tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB When)) (S (NP (NNP Aviva)) (VP (VBZ laughs) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN sleep)))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ 's) (NP (NP (DT the) (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ perfect)) (NN sound)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN world))))) (. !)))
